main event: Three glowing orbs were sighted over Montrose, Colorado on August 9, 1965.
interesting points: The orbs were described as being bright white and moving at a high speed, stopping and making 90-degree turns.
The sighting lasted for about 4 minutes and 25 seconds.
The witness said the objects looked like search lights.
Other witnesses in the area reported similar sightings of bright, fast-moving objects.
The Air Force concluded the sighting was likely of aircraft, but that the data quality was poor and the evaluation was questionable.
